relevant_findings.general: NAD, A&Ox2, not oriented to time
relevant_findings.neck: No JVD, no LAD, no TM, faint bruit on L
relevant_findings.abdominal: Soft, mildly distended, TTP b/l lower quadrants with involuntary guarding and rebound, quite tender at L flank and CVA
relevant_findings.inguinal_hernias: B/L inguinal hernias, L > R, reducible, tender to palp over L without overlying skin changes
relevant_findings.DRE: Normal tone, no masses, no gross or occult blood
relevant_findings.extremities: Warm and well perfused, no peripheral edema
